Past Winners

Celebrating the achievements of our past participants and their innovative data analysis solutions.

DataFest 2025

Winners - Best in Show Award

  • Paul Fabian Raj - M.S. in Computer Science
  • Meganad Yadav - STEM-MBA
  • Sahaja appani - M.S. in Business Analytics
  • Oluwafemi Augustine Fasuyi - M.S. in Business Analytics
  • Mradul Gautam - M.S. in Business Analytics
  • Rezi Shullazi - M.S. in Computer Science

Prize: Badge for "Best in Show" and one year membership to The American Statistical Association (ASA)

Winners - Best Visualization Award

  • Paul Fabian Raj - M.S. in Computer Science
  • Meganad Yadav - STEM-MBA

Prize: Badge for "Best Visualization" and one year membership to The American Statistical Association (ASA)

DataFest 2024

Winners - Best Insight Award

  • Jennifer Meggison - B.S. Social Sciences
  • Erica Perkins - B.S. Computer Science

Prize: Badge for "Best Insight" and one year membership to The American Statistical Association (ASA)

DataFest 2022

Winners - Best Insight Award

  • Rose Pepoy - B.S. in Applied Management
  • Ruth Adams - B.S. Operations & Supply Chain Management

Prize: Badge for "Best Insight" and one year membership to The American Statistical Association (ASA)
